messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I’m a rookie breeder, but I’ll do
my very best!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
It’s all right!
I’m still a rookie!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
The best way to raise Pokémon?...Hmm, when it comes right down to it,
isn’t it all about love?
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I can’t be a rookie forever.
I’ve learned a lot since we last met.
